description: Raphael Jayaseelath Fernando. Vs Hon. Attorney General before Hon. K.M.G.H. Kulatunga, J
parties: Raphael Jayaseelath Fernando. Vs Hon. Attorney General
keywords: Possession of heroin • Chain of Production • Inward journey • Competing versions • Custody of the productions • Police witness • Conviction and sentence set aside
